about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm Daniel Wilczak, a Fullstack .NET Developer with experience in web and mobile application development, specializing in .NET Framework, React, Vue.js, and React Native.
about.experience: With over 3 years of experience in .NET development, I've worked with companies in Warsaw building scalable web and mobile applications using modern technologies.
contact.title: Contact Me
contact.intro: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Feel free to reach out through any of the following channels:

about.intro.passion: I'm passionate about creating innovative solutions that solve real-world problems and deliver exceptional user experiences.
about.intro.experience: With over 3 years of experience in .NET development, I've worked with companies in Warsaw to build scalable web and mobile applications. My expertise spans from backend development with .NET Framework to frontend work with React, Vue.js, and Angular, as well as mobile development with React Native.
about.intro.learning: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community. I believe in continuous learning and staying updated with the latest trends in technology.

about.cta.desc: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Whether you need a website, mobile app, or AI solution, I'd love to help bring your ideas to life.

contact.faq.response.question: What's your typical response time?
contact.faq.response.answer: I typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days.
contact.faq.international.question: Do you work with international clients?
contact.faq.international.answer: Absolutely! I work with clients worldwide and am comfortable with different time zones.
contact.faq.info.question: What information should I include?
contact.faq.info.answer: Please include your project goals, timeline, budget range, and any specific requirements.

projects.featured.portfolio.desc: Modern portfolio website built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS featuring internationalization and dark mode.

projects.featured.tasks.desc: Full-stack application for project and task management with real-time collaboration features.

contact.currentJob.title: Fullstack .NET Developer/React
web.projects.periodicTable.title: Periodic Table of Elements
web.projects.periodicTable.description: Interactive periodic table of elements displaying chemical properties
web.projects.periodicTable.longDescripti: An interactive web application showcasing the periodic table of elements. This hobby project features a clean, responsive design that displays chemical properties, atomic information, and element details in an intuitive interface.
web.projects.wolfPursuit.title: Wolf Pursuit
web.projects.wolfPursuit.description: Comprehensive productivity platform for achieving goals and building better habits
web.projects.wolfPursuit.longDescription: A modern, modular productivity platform built with Next.js 14+ and TypeScript. Features include calendar management, focus sessions (Pomodoro), task organization, habit tracking with streaks, note-taking, sleep tracking, finance management, and AI-powered insights. Built with shadcn/ui for a beautiful and responsive user experience.
web.projects.ecommerce.title: E-commerce Platform
web.projects.ecommerce.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with payment processing, inventory management, and admin dashboard
web.projects.ecommerce.longDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built with modern web technologies. Features include user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, payment integration with Stripe, order management, and admin dashboard for inventory control.
web.projects.taskDashboard.title: Task Management Dashboard
web.projects.taskDashboard.description: Collaborative project management tool with real-time updates and team collaboration features
web.projects.taskDashboard.longDescripti: A comprehensive task management solution designed for teams. Includes project creation, task assignment, progress tracking, real-time notifications, and collaborative features like comments and file sharing.
web.projects.financeTracker.title: Personal Finance Tracker
web.projects.financeTracker.description: Financial management application with expense tracking, budget planning, and analytics
web.projects.financeTracker.longDescript: A personal finance management tool that helps users track expenses, set budgets, and analyze spending patterns. Features include expense categorization, monthly reports, and financial goal tracking.
web.projects.realEstate.title: Real Estate Listing Platform
web.projects.realEstate.description: Property listing website with advanced search, virtual tours, and agent management system
web.projects.realEstate.longDescription: A modern real estate platform connecting buyers, sellers, and agents. Features property listings with high-quality images, virtual tour integration, advanced search filters, and agent profile management.
mobile.projects.pomoBeat.title: Pomo Beat
mobile.projects.pomoBeat.description: Pomodoro timer application for time management and productivity
mobile.projects.pomoBeat.longDescription: A mobile Pomodoro timer application designed to boost productivity through the Pomodoro Technique. Features customizable work and break intervals, progress tracking, and productivity statistics.
